description: Try our easy to follow Carrot Gratin recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable bake,Seafood free,Christmas,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Carrot Gratin Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg carrots, peeled, diagonally cut into 1cm-thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Heat oil in a saucepan. Add onion and garlic, and cook for 3 minutes or until soft. Stir in carrot and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in stock. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.

Combine breadcrumbs, chive, butter and parmesan in a bowl. Transfer carrot mixture to an ovenproof dish. Top with breadcrumb mixture and bake in the oven for 20-25 minutes until golden and crisp. Serve.
